content.query: NCProtectUAL_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) | order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Get last 7 days records

content.query: NCProtectUAL_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) and Type_s == 'LoginFailure' | summarize FailedRequestCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), UserDisplayName_s, UserEmail_s, UserLoginName_s, Type_s, JSONExtra_s | where  FailedRequestCount > 3
content.title: Login failed consecutively for more than 3 times in an hour by user

content.query: NCProtectUAL_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(1h) and Type_s == 'Open' and Status_s == 'Fail' | summarize FailedRequestCount = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h), UserDisplayName_s, UserEmail_s, UserLoginName_s, Type_s, JSONExtra_s, DocumentUrl_s | where  FailedRequestCount > 3
content.title: Download failed consecutively for more than 3 times in an hour by user

content.query: NCProtectUAL_CL | where TimeGenerated > ago(7d) and (Type_s == 'Create' or Type_s == 'Modify' or Type_s == 'Delete') and isnotempty(RuleName_s) | order by TimeGenerated desc
content.title: Get logs for rule created or modified or deleted records in last 7 days
